mapper.select: SELECT MAX(CASE WHEN table_name = 'attraction_total' THEN row_count END) AS attraction_total, MAX(CASE WHEN table_name = 'member_total' THEN row_count END) AS member_total FROM ( SELECT 'attraction_total' AS table_name, COUNT(*) AS row_count FROM attraction_info UNION SELECT 'member_total' AS table_name, COUNT(*) AS row_count FROM member WHERE member_position = '사용자' ) AS subquery;
